entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
